notes:
Boreth was once a normal person and a citizen of [[Carlin]]. He, his brothers [[Arthei]], [[Marziel]], and [[Lersatio]], and Arthei's wife [[Kala]], travelled to [[Yalahar]] in order to find a new home. From that moment on Marziel started keeping a [[Arthei's Descent into Vampirism I (Book)|diary]].
Boreth is a plant-crazy vampire. You can see it by the lots of plants that grow in his tower. He is the first boss you will encounter during the [[Blood Brothers Quest]]. You can summon him by thrice using a [[Firebug]] on the [[Twines]] in front of his throne. There are 2 [[Plaguethrower]]s in his room.
You will receive [[The Dust of Boreth]] when you use a [[Blessed Wooden Stake]] on his dead body.
sounds: I'll water my plants with your blood!
name: Boreth
behaviour: Fights until death in close combat. He uses [[Invisibility]] very often. Summons 3-4 [[Vampire]]s at once.
strategy: '''Knights:''' the best option is to [[Exori]] or [[Exori Gran]] as much as possible while keeping an eye on your health.  That way you kill all the summons as well so they don't do extra damage.
